attributes.action: what has been done to protect Political Asylum Seekers?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently the media has published that there are more than half a million Asylum Seekers (most of them are political asylum seekers) in the country who are waiting for Home Office decisions. These decisions are sometime takes more than 7-10 years. The people who are immigrated to this country must have a good reason to claim asylum so my question is, what has been done to protect them under European human right law?
